body.en: I'm a software engineer & full-stack web developer specialized in <u class="text-white">commercial projects</u>, <u class="text-white">startup creations</u>, <u class="text-white">corporate identity</u>, and <u class="text-white">personal websites</u>. My job is to bring ideas to life through dynamic client-developer experiences, working as a team to transform amazing ideas into exceptional realities.

Mi trabajo es traer ideas a la realidad a travÃ©s de experiencias dinÃ¡micas entre el cliente y el desarrollador, trabajando en equipo para transformar ideas asombrosas en realidades excepcionales.

body.en: When I'm not developing commercial applications, I'm working on personal & open source projects, as well as mentoring beginner programmers and students with an awesome team at The Electric Hive; but the most important thing is, I'm always discovering, learning, and improving, one day at a time.
